function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of green areas in urban spaces","Impact":"Reduced ability to respond to pandemics","Mitigation":"Increase the presence of green areas in urban environments","Technologies":"Urban planning and landscaping technologies","People":"Urban residents, city planners, and architects","Owner":"City planning authorities and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air control in office buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation, filtration, and humidification systems; implement access separation and office space distribution changes","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air filtration technology, building design software","People":"Office workers, building managers, and architects","Owner":"Building owners and management companies"},{"Description":"High firm density in office spaces","Impact":"Higher fatality rates during pandemics","Mitigation":"Reduce firm density, consider office size and urban distribution, promote telecommuting","Technologies":"Telecommuting technology, urban planning software, office space design tools","People":"Office workers, business owners, and health authorities","Owner":"Business owners and city planning authorities"}]}
